title: 187: Miracle Mindset with JJ Virgin
description:
How do you access the miracle mindset?

I’m excited to welcome an extraordinary guest and friend, JJ Virgin, to the show. JJ is a celebrity Nutrition Expert, Fitness Hall of Famer, and New York Times bestselling author of The Virgin Diet. JJ was also an integral part of the launch of my new book, Limitless.

In this episode, I get the privilege of talking with JJ about her book, Miracle Mindset, and the mindset she chose to adopt as she fought for her own son’s life. Her amazing story of hope, strength, and tenacity are nothing short of inspiring, and so timely as many of us are going through challenging times due to recent events.

If you or someone you know is struggling during these unpredictable times, but looking for encouragement and want to know what it takes to access the miracle mindset, then be sure to listen to today’s show.

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
